|brand = Logitech |model = Squeezebox |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Controller |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = audio streamer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = JNZCRL65 |icid = 1807A-CRL65 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;S3C2412XL; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM926EJ |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- ARM920T, ARMv4 --> |cpu1spd = 200 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F1208U0C-PCB0; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4M561633G; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 00:04:20
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.0.0;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.22-P7;SqueezeOS 7.8.0 (Build r16739);
|exp_if_types = SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 3.7 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_conn = n/a, battery powered
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, Li-ion battery, IR LED, RTC, speaker, Audio 3.5mm out, LCD Display, |addchip = Stereo CODEC for Portable Audio Applications;Wolfson;WM8750S;;1;,,, USB Power Manager and Li-Ion Charger;Linear Technology;LTC4085;;1;,,, LED Driver W/ Digital and PWM Brightness Control;TI;TPS61060;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74HC14;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74AHC125;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/04/2008 |estreldate = 03/2008 |estprice = 299 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001413GT6<!-- multi=yes --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Murata LBWA-EP |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8686; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = Fixed Non-Removable |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' S3C2412XL @200MHz ARM926EJ *Memory: 64MB SDRAM *Onboard Storage: 64MB NAND Flash, SD card slot *Wifi: 802.11bg *Power Source: 3.7V 1250mAh Li-Ion battery
{{See also|Logitech|Logitech Squeezebox Radio|Logitech Squeezebox Receiver}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.slimdevices.com/index.php/Squeezebox_Controller.html ''Squeezebox Controller'' on '''Slim Devices''' wiki]
